price: (Ɛyε) anigyesεm ne kͻkͻbͻ (Nwoma). Nanso dodoͻ no ara na atwe wͻn ho (afiri ho) a enti wͻntie.
arabic: بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا فَأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bashīran wanadhīran fa-aʿraḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasmaʿūna
